entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Victoria Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Beach 09:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -33.1°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 18.
